NarrSect.Content:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- A REACTIVE BUFFER - Case Study - -- Action Refinement: controller and ring partitions - -- Example extracted from the paper "A Refinement Strategy for Circus" - -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
You must always include the circus\_toolkit, and also check inside it to see the LaTeX commands the parser recognises (or to create your own commands)

NarrPara.Content:
Unfortunately boxed processes (those spread across multiple begin/end Circus) are not yet available. You need to define your processes within one environment only. The only real problem is for axiomatic definitions (that I am looking into now). Schemas can be given horizontally.
I know it doesn't typeset nicely. This boxed-process feature will be available soon. The bottom line is that apart from
\begin{StoreNewCache} \Delta CBufferState \where size > 1 \\ size' = size-1 \land cache' = ring~bot \\ bot' = (bot \mod maxring)+1 \land top' = top \\ ring' = ring \end{StoreNewCache}
